description: Installation of new shop front and provide an internal staircase, with a new entrance from The Broadway to first floor and use of the club at rear ground floor as an extension to retail shops
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | The communal car parking spaces shown on the approved plan shall be kept continuously available for ancillary car parking and shall not be used for any other purpose.  REASON:  To ensure that there is adequate provision for car parking within the site, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B5, T39, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 9.1, 9.11. | The communal car park shall not be used for servicing the retail use hereby permitted at any time.  REASON:  In the interests of amenity of nearby residents and in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B5, B8, ES5, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 4.11.
